ing: 1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1/3 cup olive oil, or more as needed
des: "Eser's great balsamic salad dressing. Store leftover dressing in a shakable sealed container in the refrigerator for up to two weeks."
ins: Combine balsamic vinegar, honey, mustard, garlic, oregano, salt, and black pepper in a food processor. Turn the food processor on; pour olive oil in a steady stream into balsamic vinegar mixture until salad dressing is thick and creamy.
